metadata.title: CVE-2024-6064 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in GPAC 2.5-DEV-rev228-g11067ea92-master. It hasbeen declared as problematic. This vulnerability affects the functionxmt_node_end of the file src/scene_manager/loader_xmt.c of the componentMP4Box. The manipulation leads to use after free. Local access is requiredto approach this attack. The exploit has been disclosed to the public andmay be used. The name of the patch isf4b3e4d2f91bc1749e7a924a8ab171af03a355a8/c1b9c794bad8f262c56f3cf690567980d96662f5.It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. The identifier ofthis vulnerability is VDB-268792.

criterions.comment: gpac package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
